original_text: But so much the more went there a fame abroad of him: and great multitudes came together to hear, and to be healed by him of their infirmities.
korean_text: 예수의 소문이 더욱 퍼지매 수많은 무리가 말씀도 듣고 자기 병도 고침을 받고자 하여 모여 오되

sentences.original_text: But so much the more went there a fame abroad of him
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그에 대한 소문이 점점 더 널리 퍼져나갔다

sentences.original_text: and to be healed by him
